Do not water on specified hours.\nPrograms will be paused during restricted hours and will be resumed after restriction.

Please update your RainMachine device firmware to the latest version
Updating the firmware of your RainMachineâ€¦\nDo not power it off while the update is in progress.
You have not verified your email. Please check %1$s for a confirmation email.
In order to remotely access your RainMachine, you need to provide a valid email.
Congratulations! Your RainMachine is ready to use.
Allow multiple zone queueing by pressing \"Start Water\" button.
Seconds of inactivity until touch display sleeps.
Seconds to wait until the action executes automatically when a button is pressed.
During the watering restrictions time intervals.
Show P on digit display and enable to manually start selected program.

Enable or disable local discovery. Disabling Local discovery will force all connections through RainMachine Proxy Service.\n\nNOTE: Local Discovery might not work in LAN environments with multiple Wi-Fi repeaters.

RainMachine is OFFLINE

This may be because:
- there was an electrical outage,
- the RainMachine device is unplugged,
- Wi-Fi connection on the device is bad or is off
If you no longer wish to view this RainMachine device in your list
To continue with the setup process, tap on any of the backlit touch buttons from the RainMachine device.
Add watering time for at least one zone
Select at least a weekday or change frequency type
There are unsaved changes to this program. Are you sure you want to leave the screen?
Next run must be a date in the future
Required by some municipalities. This will override RainMachine algorithm.
Successfully copied the program to a new one
Weather-Adaptive Watering is ON\nSuggested Duration is determined from your plant type, soil and location properties for a typical summer day.
Zone settings are set to default values.\nMake sure they are correct.
Use Live Weather or Seasonal Adjustments as specified on your zones properties.
Fixed watering durations for each zone.
Weather-Adaptive Watering, Cycle & Soak, Delay between zones, Rain restrictions
Set program start time based on Sun\'s position.
In order to get notifications you must set up a remote access account for your device.
Prevents the device from starting any watering activity for the defined duration.
Enter a positive value for the snooze duration!
Amount of rain adjusted with multiplier from 0 to 100%. Default is 80%.\nNot all rain gets to the plants, consider runoffs.
Stop all watering when rain is detected.
Hardware Rain Sensor is normally closed and open when rain is detected.
How to connect a Rain Sensor to RainMachine
Are you sure you want to disable Remote Access? You will lose the remote connection to your RainMachine.
Are you sure you want to disable Remote Access? You will lose your remote connection to your RainMachine.
Every time a RainMachine was accessed using this app, a backup of its Zones, Programs and Watering Restrictions* was saved.
*Watering Restrictions backup is not available for the 1st gen of RainMachine Touch HD-12 devices.
Restore \"%1$s\" backup saved on %2$s. All zones, programs and watering restrictions on your device will be replaced with the ones from this backup.
Choose which backup version to restore
Successfully restored backup. Please be aware that only the first 8 out of the 12 zones from the backup were restored.
Successfully restored backup. Please be aware that only the first 8 out of the 16 zones from the backup were restored.
Successfully restored backup. Please be aware that only the first 12 out of the 16 zones from the backup were restored.
Do not water on specified months.
Do not water on specified days.\nEvapotranspiration calculations are discarded on the restricted days.
This feature allows users to set a minimum time for their sprinklers to run. Any time below that threshold will rollover to the next watering cycle.
Select at least one day of the week
Advanced settings for weather sources, rain and wind sensitivity…
Do not water on specific Months, Days or Hours…
Show or hide graph on Dashboard screen

Your device has a setting enabled that negatively impacts the connection to the RainMachine Wi-Fi.

Please go to the Advanced Wi-Fi Settings screen and disable it. The setting is called either "Avoid poor networks" or "Auto network switch".

If you can not find this setting, please temporarily disable your mobile 3G/4G data connection and press I FEEL LUCKY below.
Successfully restored initial settings. RainMachine is now rebootingâ€¦
Restore zones, programs and watering restrictions
Generated PIN can be used for a limited time by a guest or support person to log in.
Read this PIN to the guest/support person in order to allow remote logging on this device.
All your programs, zone properties and Wi-Fi settings will be removed.
This action will restart the device. No settings or data will be affected.
Are you sure you want to stop all watering?
Are you sure you want to restore weather settings to default values?
These settings are meant for advanced users. Changing their values could affect all RainMachine watering activities.
Based on your location, NOAA (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration) is the recommended and sufficient weather data service.
If future water needs should take in account past precipitations. This works best if you are using a weather service that has weather stations.
In order to use WUnderground weather source you must obtain WUnderground Developer API key.
Test WUnderground service using your Developer API key:
Test NetAtmo service using your credentials:
Optionally you can use one nearby weather station that\'s closest to your location
Unable to save weather source setting
If multiple weather sources are enabled the results will be averaged.
Authentication failed for %1$s Wi-Fi. Please make sure you enter the Wi-Fi password correctly.

Your RainMachine could not be connected successfully to your \"%1$s\" Wi-Fi network. This is usually due to either a bad password or weak Wi-Fi signal strength at RainMachine location. Please try again.
You would not be able to download weather data.
Successfully connected to the desired Wi-Fi network
Please make sure you are typing the correct Wi-Fi password. Thank you.
0–33% Little or no wind exposure.\n33–75% Urban areas + trees (Default).\n75–100% Full wind exposure, open fields.
In order to remotely access your RainMachine, you need to provide a valid email.
In order to be able to access your RainMachine remotely you need to provide a valid email address.
Adjust watering times based on live weather data. (Needs Internet connection)
Adjust watering times based on locally stored daily averages based on 10 year weather history for your location. (No Internet connection needed)
Open \'Master Valve\' before a program starts and keep the \'Master Valve\' ON after a program ends.
Open \"Master Valve\" before cycle/program starts for (mm:ss):
Keep \"Master Valve\" on after cycle/program ends for (mm:ss):
Daily summer watering time suggested by EPA WaterSense
Not scheduled. This is just a suggestion.
Scheduled to run for a typical summer day and calculated based on advanced zone settings properties. This time will be adjusted automatically to any program that uses this zone.
Increase this value if the RainMachine starts too soon after a rain event.
The amount of water content held in the soil after excess water has drained away.

Note: If weather data is temporarily unreachable RainMachine will automatically fall back on Seasonal Adjustments until connectivity is restored. If Seasonal Adjustments is turned off the fallback will be \"Do not Adjust\".
Keep watering times exactly as set by user.
Use these options if you want watering history to also show water consumed.
(optional, used instead of area for drip irrigation)

Please set up your RainMachine password. It is required to access your device locally or remotely.
